channel.title: Changing home? please help?
channel.description:
Hello, I wan't to change the home area. but i don't know how to. I can change it by using ,
[code]1. Go to ur player file of ur source
2. Search for
// initial x and y coordinates of the player
3. Eddit the coors to what u want
Than it looks like this
teleportToX = 2478; // 2478; teleportToY = 3311; // 3311;[/code]
but wen you go to the emote list you go stairght to the old home area. If anyone know's how please tell me what do code. and how to mod the shops around. I want the new home to have shop's in it.

item.title: Changing home? please help?

item.description:
@system wrote:

i can only find it in player.java

item.title: Changing home? please help?
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Open player.java, and search for the cooridnants of the old home place, change them to the new home place. ALL OF THE COORDINANTS. Do this for

Client.java
playerhandler.java

and player.java

Read full topic

item.title: Changing home? please help?

item.description:
@system wrote:

Hello, I wan’t to change the home area. but i don’t know how to. I can change it by using ,

[code]1. Go to ur player file of ur source

  1. Search for

     // initial x and y coordinates of the player

  2. Eddit the coors to what u want

Than it looks like this

    teleportToX = 2478; // 2478;
    teleportToY = 3311; // 3311;[/code]

but wen you go to the emote list you go stairght to the old home area. If anyone know’s how please tell me what do code. and how to mod the shops around. I want the new home to have shop’s in it.
